title: IAssemblyDoc.ShowExploded2
description: Displays the specified exploded view for the current assembly configuration.
signature:

   System.Boolean
ShowIt
,
   System.String

parameters.name: ShowIt
parameters.description: True if you want to show ExplodeViewName in its exploded state, false if you want to show it in its collapsed state

parameters.name: ExplodeViewName
parameters.description: Name of the exploded view to show

returns: True if the exploded view displays, false if not
